venue.name: Show Case Cinimas in North Haven

item.description:
Good Evening Coffee Talkers,

Indiana Jones and the Kingdom of the Crystal Skull
Started in Late May, so I have scheduled going to the movie
In early June.

We will be going to North Haven Showcase because it is central
To many members.

Car pooling is encouraged since the price of gas is insane.

I will be inside the Main Front Doors on the Left Hand Side for 15 minutes prior to the Movie.
We will try for the 6:45 pm movie, so let us try to meet between 6:15 & 6:30.
If there is some problem, then the next movie is at 7:15 pm.

Hope to see some of you come to the movies.

Maybe we will go to either Barnes & Noble for coffee or
Go to one of the restaurants over by Target after the movie.

A.

http://www.indianajon...

www.indianajones.com/site/index.html

B.

http://www.imdb.com/t...


www.imdb.com/title/tt0367882/

C.

http://www.google.com...


www.google.com/search?hl=en&q=Indiana+Jones&btnG=Google+Search

D.

http://www.wafflemovi...

www.wafflemovies.com/

Are there any other movies that Members want to watch?

I will not go to see Sex in the City, but if members want to go see it then
We can schedule a Meet Up for it.

I will try to schedule a Meet Up for Get Smart a week or two after
It comes out.

I might be going to Milford to pick up friends/members before
Going to North Haven.

Mike B

Assistant Organizer

Coffee Talk
item.how_to_find_us: I will be inside the Main Front Doors on the Left Hand Side for 15 minutes prior to the Movie. We will try for the 6:45 pm movie, so let us try to meet between 6:15 & 6:30. If there is some problem, then the next movie is at 7:15 pm.
item.why: Who in the commuting distance of North Haven wants to go to the Movie on a Sunday night.
item.name: Coffee Talkers go to an Indiana Jones Movie on June 1
